title: Build, Building
content:
BUILD, BUILDING

To build means to make something, often using wood, stone, or other materials. A building is something that people make for shelter or use, like a house, temple, or city wall. The Bible talks often about building or rebuilding altars, temples, homes, and cities. Sometimes the Bible uses the word build as a picture of God’s work in his people (1 Peter 2:4–8).

See Architecture.
